newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai stocks fall 2.78 percent on profit taking.
newsitem.headline: Thai stocks fall 2.78 percent on profit taking.

text.p: Thai stocks dropped 2.78 percent on active trade by 0850 GMT as investors took profits in key stocks across the board, brokers said.
The composite SET index dropped 18.37 points to 641.41 on 5.3 billion baht turnover in late afternoon trade.
All the key sectors retreated with the finance sector falling most, declining 4.30 percent, followed by the banking sector losing 3.29 percent.
The index rose slightly to 641.70 points, or down 2.74 percent, at 0900 GMT.
